definition: A person who possesses specialized knowledge, skills, and expertise in a particular field or domain. This term is commonly used to refer to someone who is considered an expert or professional in their respective area of expertise.

examples.german: Der Fachmann hat das Problem schnell gelöst.
examples.english: The expert quickly solved the problem.

examples.german: Als Fachmann auf diesem Gebiet kann er Ihnen helfen.
examples.english: As an expert in this field, he can help you.

examples.german: Der Fachmann hat umfangreiches Wissen über das Thema.
examples.english: The specialist has extensive knowledge about the topic.

examples.german: Ein Fachmann wurde beauftragt, das Problem zu untersuchen.
examples.english: An expert was commissioned to investigate the problem.

examples.german: Der Fachmann hat eine fundierte Meinung zu diesem Thema.
examples.english: The professional has a well-founded opinion on this topic.
